caption.p: Phylogenetic relationship of HCV genotype 3a NS5B sequences from FSU countries: For the construction of the phylogenetic tree, a stretch of HCV sequence corresponding to H77 nucleotide 8322â€“8555 was used. The sequences are included from Azerbaijan, Georgia, Estonia, Lithuania, Russia, Tajikistan, and Uzbekistan. The color key is the same as for Figure 1.
